articles.title: “The models were right”: astronomers find ‘missing’ matter - European Space Agency
articles.description: Astronomers have discovered a huge filament of hot gas bridging four galaxy clusters. At 10 times as massive as our galaxy, the thread could contain some of the Universe’s ‘missing’ matter, addressing a decades-long mystery.
articles.content:
